

Welcome to CauseMap
====================

.. raw:: html
    <p>
    <table>
    <tr>

:raw-html:`<td>` |image1| :raw-html:`</td>`
:raw-html:`<td>` |image2| :raw-html:`</td>`
:raw-html:`<td>` |image3| :raw-html:`</td>`

.. raw:: html

    </tr>
    </table>
    </p>


CauseMap is an implementation of :ref:`Convergent Cross Mapping <intro>` (CCM) [1]_, written in Julia.

To get started right away, follow the :doc:`Quickstart <Quickstart>`.

Source code is available here: https://github.com/cyrusmaher/CauseMap.jl

Also, feel free to check out the latest version of our `paper <https://github.com/cyrusmaher/CauseMap.jl/blob/master/manuscripts/CauseMap_latest.docx?raw=true>`_!



.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   AboutCauseMap
   Quickstart
   ParaDidiExample

.. [1] Sugihara,G. *et al.* (2012) Detecting causality in complex ecosystems. *Science*, 338, 496â€“500.
